title: Worked Solution
text: To solve this equation using the subtraction and addition properties of equality, we can subtract $$\frac{1}{4}$$ from both sides of the equation. This gives us: $$b=\frac{3}{4}-\frac{1}{4}$$ $$=\frac{3-1}{4}$$ $$=\frac{2}{4}$$ $$=\frac{1}{2}$$ So the solution to the equation is $$b=\frac{1}{2}$$.
